content.rendered: Welcome to the University of La Verne policies website.  The most current versions of officially approved University-wide policies will be displayed on this website. College- and department-specific policies and procedures also may be housed on individual college and department websites.

excerpt.rendered: Welcome to the University of La Verne policies website.  The most current versions of officially approved University-wide policies will be displayed on this website. College- and department-specific policies and procedures also may be housed on individual college and department websites.
